openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command to Draw and Add

HowToBuy.value: Use Channel Points to buy entries into this month's Raffle!
HowToBuy.label: How To Buy Raffle Ticket

WhatToWin.value: This month's prize is TBD! The Drawing will be held TBD.
WhatToWin.label: What To Win and When Is Draw

WinMessage.label: Draw Message
WinMessage.tooltip:
!raffle draw picks the winner of the raffle.
{0} = winner

AddedMessage.value: @{0} has been added to the list.
AddedMessage.label: Viewer Added Message
AddedMessage.tooltip:
!raffle UserName adds the name to the raffle list.
{0} = username

ClearMessage.value: The ticket list has been cleared.
ClearMessage.label: Clear Tickets Message
ClearMessage.tooltip: !raffle clear removes all names from the list.

ErrorMessage.value: Error Occured. Please check the logs
ErrorMessage.label: Error Message
ErrorMessage.tooltip: Message the bot sends if an error occurs
